page.title: 05FIRTREE LODGE, BITTESWELL
page.content: We have a garage which is next to some stables.Further on there is a large farm building.Further still there is an outdoor straw stack near a new cow building.The cow building is connected to a silage pit.We also have 60 acres of land which surrounds the house.Some of the land is used for growing crops such as: barley,hay and silage.The other land is used for animal grazing,mostly for horses, although cattle graze on it too. There are two people in the family who are interested in horses : my elder sister and my mother.There are six horses one pony and a goat.My mum buys the horses as novices,works them up to higher grades and eventually sells them to another yard.She goes showjumping between one and four times a week.
